name: 李後燦
objective: Introduction to computer is a fundamental course for student in engineering. It includes the knowledge of computer hardware, software, application and network. The goal of this course is that the students have the basic knowledge of computer as they need in the future.
schedule:
1. Introduction
2.History of computer
3.Architecture of a computer
4.Computer hardware (I)
5.Computer hardware (II)
6.Computer software (I)
7.Computer software (II)
8.Computer software (III)
9.MID EXAM
10.Introduction to network architecture
11.LAN, MAN and WAN
12.Internet
13.Email and social network
14.Commercial application
15.Engineering Application
16.Computer in optical application
17.Optical computer development
18.Final EXAM
materials: Discovering Computers : Gary. B. Shelly, Misty E. Vermaat, 歐亞, 2016
